name: Rapunzel: Away Without Leave
description:
"All grown-ups were once children.... but only few of them remember it." _ Antoine de Saint-Exupery, The Little Prince.

This was the quote that inspired this captivating interpretation of the story of Rapunzel as she attempts to run away from her "mother". As she flees officers around her are turned into rabid rabbits that attempt to stop her in her tracks. Help her escape her grasp and find a way to finally Leave.

A Prototype Artefact designed by Red Rapids:
Michaela
Gervince
Sonja
Sabrina
Ekaterina
Anton
